summary: A group of friends get together for a murder mystery party, but things take a dark turn when one hijacks the evening and is out for blood.
cast: Alyssa Lobit|Jennifer Blanc-Biehn|Kamala Jones|AJ Bowen|Brianne Davis|Christopher Backus|Dana Daurey|Chris Meyer|Kane Hodder|Bryan Kirkwood|Denny Kirkwood|Amber West|Matthew Ziff|Lorraine Ziff|Nate Vormehr|Jenise Blanc|Jason Sallee|Xavier Gens|Alana Lobit|Larry Ziff|Miller Daurey|Jay Lobit|Mark Gantt|Maral Adams|Tanya Newbould|Danielle Harris|Adam Cole|Erik Preston|Kimberly McCullough|Rodney Amieva|Seth Wilson|Cristian Sandoval|David Rodriguez|Xochielt Hicks|Michael Biehn
title: Among Friends
